title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximize Productivity with the Amazon Q Developer CLI Agent (DVT223)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Q Developer CLI 代理最大化生产力 (DVT223)
abstract: Explore the different ways that the Amazon Q Developer CLI agent can be used to save time and effort when working in the command line. This session delivers practical strategies for anyone aiming to integrate the Amazon Q Developer CLI Agent into their workflows. Learn from real-world examples and demos that showcase how to maximize productivity when interacting with AWS services, using the AWS CLI, and SDKs from the command line. This presentation is brought to you by Pluralsight, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 探索Amazon Q Developer CLI代理的不同使用方式，以节省命令行工作中的时间和精力。本课程为希望将Amazon Q Developer CLI代理集成到工作流程中的任何人提供实用策略。通过真实案例和演示学习如何在命令行中与AWS服务交互、使用AWS CLI和SDK时最大化生产力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Pluralsight提供。
